name: 蘇昱瑋
objective:
介紹氣體的物理性質，熱力學第一、第二與第三定律，化學反應之熱能變化與動力學，以及系統中的相平衡。
This course contents the following subjects: the physical properties of gases, the first law, second law and third law of thermodynamics, enthalpy change in chemical reaction, chemical kinetic and the phase equilibria in a system.
schedule:
week 1~2: Basic concepts of thermodynamics
week 3~4: The first law of thermodynamics
week 5~6: The second law of thermodynamics
week 7~8: The third law of thermodynamics
week 9: midterm exam
week 10: themodynamics web
week 11~13: Equilibria (Fugacity, Phase diagrams)
week 14~15: Chemical reaction
week 16~17: Gas kinetics theory
weekl 18: Final exam
materials:
1. Engineering and Chemical Thermodynamics 
Milo D. Koretsky, (Wiley)

2. Physical Chemistry
Robert. G. Mortimer
consultation: Office hour，課程的 line 群組。
